g

y support a fanfic crossover between Peacemaker Kurogane and

ust because in my mind Emmie would beat the

ppy with the new

s, fanmade vids,

ow I

ac=
tually CHARGES us if we ask questions as to why certain things we

(*_*)...it really =
sucks...  

It's not always the  matter of if the programmer can accomplish=

ev=
en allows us to do so....moving SHQ to let's say GEOCITIES would be

xpensive due to the enormous amount of files and bandwidth

es is waaaay more expensive).
